Pros and Cons of Sphinx
========================

Advantages
--------------------------

- Industry standard for Python documentation
- Strong API documentation support
- Powerful cross-referencing
- Built-in search
- Multiple output formats


Disadvantages
--------------------------

- Steeper learning curve than Markdown
- Verbose configuration
- Overkill for very small projects

----------------------------------------------------------

When to Use Sphinx
========================

Use Sphinx when:
--------------------------

- Documentation must scale long-term
- APIs need to stay synchronized with code
- Searchable, structured documentation is required

Avoid Sphinx when:
--------------------------

- Only a README is needed
- Documentation is very small or informal
